long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows you to instantly convert Kurdish text written in the Latin alphabet into Kurdish Sorani script.

Kurdi Latin Converter is ideal for anyone looking to easily transliterate Kurdish without needing to install an additional keyboard layout. Whether it's for messaging, creating documents, or general communication, this converter makes it simple and convenient to transform Kurdish text into the Sorani script effortlessly.
